RmiClient - Class in adrenaline.network.rmi.client
Class used to connect a generic client to the server after choosing rmi option.
RmiClient(UserInterface) - Constructor for class adrenaline.network.rmi.client.RmiClient
Create a RMI generic client with a reference to the view he is using
RmiClientCallbackInterface - Interface in adrenaline.network.rmi
Interface that declares methods callable by the RMI server on a RMI client, it is used by the server to identify each client
RmiPlayer - Class in adrenaline.network.rmi.server
Class that instantiate a client connected with RMI on the server to maintain a reference to him and send him data whene events occurs.
RmiPlayer(MainServer, String, RmiServerClientHandler) - Constructor for class adrenaline.network.rmi.server.RmiPlayer
Instantiate a new RMI client on the server, saving the nickname of the client, a refrence to the client handlers and a reference to the main server
RmiServer - Class in adrenaline.network.rmi.server
Class that implements a server that manages RMI connection.
RmiServer(MainServer, int) - Constructor for class adrenaline.network.rmi.server.RmiServer
Creates the RMI server and make it listening on the given port
RmiServerClientHandler - Class in adrenaline.network.rmi.server
Class that manages communication between clients and server in RMI communication.
RmiServerClientHandler(MainServer) - Constructor for class adrenaline.network.rmi.server.RmiServerClientHandler
Creates a new client handler with a reference to the main server which manage data, and uploads the object on the RMI registry
RmiServerInterface - Interface in adrenaline.network.rmi
Interface that declares methods callable by a RMI client on a RMI server, it is the server representation uploaded on the RMI registry which clients looks up for when trying to connect
